rows.translation: When Allah’s help comes with victory,

bismillah.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.

rows.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
rows.translation: and you see the people entering Allah’s religion in throngs,
rows.transliteration: wara-aytan nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīnillāhi afwājā

rows.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
rows.translation: celebrate the praise of your Lord, and plead to Him for forgiveness. Indeed, He is all-clement.
rows.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wastaghfirh ۚ innahu kāna tawwābā
